txt.en: 'Ghûrdhos attack Okwô-kuryô statues. Darkness in Ghûrdhos scare Drúedain. Scare Ghûrdhos away from Okwô-kuryô statues. Must protect statues. Only way to protect forest.'
Gnô-buri-Krûg believes that defeating the Ghûrdhos near Púkel-men statues may be the best way to keep Drû Bhûta safe.
You have defeated many Ghûrdhos and stopped them from further defiling the Púkel-men statues of Taur Drúadan.
Ghûrdhos can be found near Púkel-men statues in Taur Drúadan.\n\nYou should defeat Ghûrdhos near Púkel-men statues.
